@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Tobbo88:

24/7 lol … try 4/7 its hardly online anymore =-p they banned my friend for no reason so a bunch of us duped stuff to get revenge and ill stop once were all unbanned. untill then its hardly gona be online due to trying to save their eco…

You are an idiot.

OT: Nice advertisement, I wish for the best, I haven’t checked out the forums so no feedback on that one.

item.title: Zarpor ~ FUN! ~ Economy, Skilling, Pking, Minigames, Everything!
item.dc:creator: @Joey_From_Zarpor Joey From Zarpor
item.description:
@Joey_From_Zarpor wrote:

[CENTER]

The staff of Zarpor will now be again hosting the Zarpor Monthly Puzzles!

How the Event works:

We have made an account thats’ username is the answer to the clues given in this thread.
Every few days, we will give a clue on this thread as to what the username is.

Rules:
Once you’ve figured out the username to the account, post a screenshot with proof that you’ve claimed it.
-Do not share ideas as to what the username could be.
-Do not ask for clues in-game, they will all be given on this thread.
-Staff are not allowed to participate.
-THE PASSWORD TO EVERY ACCOUNT WILL BE 123.

Join Zarpor now to become apart of our amazingly active and dedicated community

http://www.zarpor.com/

http://www.zarpor.com/forums/showthread.php?10732-Monthly-Puzzle-Games!&p=61412&viewfull=1#post61412
[/Center]

Read full topic

item.title: Zarpor ~ FUN! ~ Economy, Skilling, Pking, Minigames, Everything!
item.dc:creator: @Joey_From_Zarpor Joey From Zarpor
item.description:
@Joey_From_Zarpor wrote:

yellowtopk:

How is the switching show me a vid of it please thanks

We just revamped the entire combat system, try it out - better switching then RuneScape.

[SIZE=5]Updates![/SIZE]

It’s impossible to list everything as myself and all of my staff together, have been working
very hard serveral days to get this update out for the community. We hope you
appreciate every bit of it!

[SIZE=4][Combat][/SIZE]
• Combat system totally redone.
• Range bolt enchanting + effects,
• Magic, splashes correctly based on bonuses etc.
• Melee hit formulas touched up quite a bit.
• Special attack hits and accuracy tweaked.
• Brand new following system and clipping!
• All attack styles are balanced!
• Much, much, more! Check it out…

[SIZE=4][Additional bug fixes][/SIZE]
• Password changing bug fixed.
• Several banking bugs fixed.
• A few zombies minigame bugs fixed.
• Use Item hovers fixed.
• All bosses have correct animations.
• Fishing, woodcutting and firemaking bugs fixed.
• All runecrafting altars now work.
• Several other client bugs were fixed.

And finally, there is a portal at home which does
something cool! Check it out! Be aware it will
be quite buggy as it is only intended to make the game
a little more…interesting

By transforming through the portal, you will NOT receive
any advantage over other players, and you can return back to
normal at any time.

Be sure to download the new client (4.3) and enjoy!!!

Read full topic
